sections.heading: required to be furnished to buyers.
sections.text: required to be furnished to buyers.

sections.heading: As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Approved safety pool cover” means a manually or power-operated safety pool cover that meets all of the performance standards of the American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM) in compliance with standard F1346-91

This chapter does not apply to:(1)Any system of sumps, irrigation canals, or irrigation flood control or drainage works constructed or operated for the purpose of storing, delivering, distributing, or conveying water
sections.text: (2)Stock ponds, storage tanks, livestock operations, livestock watering troughs, or
